remarks: In a friendship graph, there is exactly one walk of length 2 between two different vertices as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Feb-2018.)
statement: frg2wot1 $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ A =/= B ) -> ( # ` ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) ) = 1 ) $.
